coreAttributes.name: morning star
coreAttributes.description: A club-like weapon, consisting of a handle and a sturdy shaft, with a spiked ball fixed to the end. This spiked ball has been formed out of arcane energy, allowing its use against people without permanently wounding them.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] morning star at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] morning star at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane ball travels through [npc2.her] body!
Lunging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] morning star, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal ball travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] morning star, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal ball passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] morning star at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Lunging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] morning star, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] morning star, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
